    • addStudentInfo

      public void addStudentInfo​(String identity, LocalDateTime instant)
      Add student event, if student doesn't exist in the classroom then add it otherwise add the event to corresponding student
      Parameters:
      identity - String of the teams identity of a student
      instant - LocalDateTime of the event

    • setBegin

      public void setBegin​(LocalTime begin)
      Set the begin of the course, that allow to remove all events of students that occur before the course
      Parameters:
      begin - A localDateTime representing the begin of the course

    • setEnd

      public void setEnd​(LocalTime end)
      Set the end of the course, that allow to remove all events of students that occur after the course
      Parameters:
      end - A localDateTime representing the end of the course

    • getDate

      public LocalDate getDate()
      Get the date of the course from date stored in student event Only work if there is student in the classroom
      Returns:
      A localDate of the day when the course occur

    • getMinConnection

      public LocalTime getMinConnection()
      Get the first ever connection in the course
      Returns:
      A localTime of connection event
